```{r setup, include=FALSE}
pacman::p_load(flexdashboard,ggplot2,plotly,tidyverse,crosstalk)
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Diamonds Chart by Colour

```{r}
p1<-  diamonds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(color, group=color, fill=color))+
  geom_bar()+theme_classic()+ylab("Count")+xlab("Color")
ggplotly(p1)
```

> Source: Diamonds dataset

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Diamond Frequency by Cut

```{r, message=FALSE, error=FALSE}
p2 <- diamonds %>% 
            ggplot(aes(price,colour=cut))+
            geom_freqpoly(binwidth=500)+theme_minimal()+ylab("Count")+xlab("Price")
ggplotly(p2)
```

>Source: Diamonds dataset

### Interactive Linear Model

```{r}
p3 <- diamonds %>% 
           ggplot(aes(carat,price))+geom_point()+geom_smooth(se=TRUE)+theme_minimal()+ylab("Price")+xlab("Carat")
ggplotly(p3)
```

>Source: Diamonds dataset
